channel.title: How do you run 2 servers at once?
channel.description: Ok so am currently running a 508 server and wanted to run a 317 also.Ive already made another host at no-ip.com i don`t get what am supposed to do next can someone help me.

item.title: How do you run 2 servers at once?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Adding to Slave Scyth, port 43594 and 5555 are the most common.

item.title: How do you run 2 servers at once?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Umm, donâ€™t listen to jasper.

Just run the other server as you normally would, but on a different port. People can connect to it using the same No-IP, etc. if they just use the new port.

Read full topic
